title: What are your views on Time Magazine's list of the 100 most influential people of 2020? - Quora
tags: Time Magazine's Person of the Year
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: I don't care. They have the right to their opinions, as I have the right to mine. That said, if they want to prop up sexual predators, drug money launderers, and violent criminals who rob pregnant women at gun point, as positive role models and influencers, again, that is their Constitutional Right. My right is I can spend that 10 dollars on something else.

Honestly, I did not know 100 people who read Time Magazine. It used to be a staple on my list of must reads, but it has become less and less relevant with the break up of Time-Life and the rise of the internet. I have not seen a list and I am inclined to think it is like the magazine, largely irrelevant.
